column5: I am trying to budget for my trip. How much am I going to spend for minnows, crawlers and leeches?Thanks

Jack,Last week I bought 10 dozen minnows and 1/2 pound of leeches and it cost $45 (that's in Canadian funds). Ontario allows you to bring crawlers from home provided they're packed in artifical bedding.Hope this helps.
Depends where you are going I paid $4 a dozen for worms on maitoulin island last year.
Ear Falls leeches cost $20 a pound canadian.
Does it really matter once you get there? Enjoy!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
$3-$4 / dozen for leeches and crawlers. Likely the same for live minnows. I don't know though as we can not use them in Sask.

Jack---Salt up some minnows and take along. Work perfectly well, especiall when you dress a bait. You can aquire them here by seining, get them from a dealer--fresh dead or nearly for cheap.Prepare by covering in a mix of 1/4 salt and 3/4 borax( found in your wifes laundry area or in the s. market as a laundry product.) Keeps them pliable and preserves the color. Salt alone renders them into sticks.
